page.title: 03The Stream and Brook Hollows
page.content: Through Rolleston runs a stream called Â£Alderbrook'.It was called that because there are many Alder trees growing along its banks. Last year a silo burst open when it fell over,spilling its contents into the stream life.After a few weeks the stream was drained and refilled with fresh water. Earlier this year some workmen came to alter the stream.They were making the banks safer because they were crumbling away and the houses were going to fall; at the same time the stream bed was lowered to prevent the flooding of previous years.They also built a new foot bridge, raillings,and a water fall.
